name: Transcontinental
description:
Try to complete the rail track before the train crash into the wild !

Transcontinental is an arcade/puzzle game in which you have to create a path for the train already running on the tracks, so you must complete it before it comes to the end.

/!\ Compo entry /!\

Controls :
- Mouse to rotate and place tracks
- Up and down to control train speed
- Left and right to switch track type

Made in 48h with Gamemaker !
